settings.html:
THERE’S A BETTER WAY TO GET ALL OF YOUR CLE CREDITS IN ONE PLACE:

Explore our over 1,200+ skill-based courses built and taught by attorneys who teach ONLY the nuts and bolts for attorneys who actually want to benefit from their CLE.

settings.subtitle_1: Top-quality live and OnDemand CLE courses in 40+ practice areas. Our programming is accredited in all jurisdictions, with courses designed for practitioners of all experience levels.
settings.subtitle_2: Attend our live, in-person Continuing Legal Education seminars at fantastic locations. Earn your CLE credits while enjoying an engaging and interactive experience.

settings.subtitle_1: As a subscriber, you’ll gain unlimited access to our endless library of industry-leading content, covering every topic you can imagine.
settings.subtitle_2: If you’re a true crime enthusiast and looking to enhance your legal knowledge, you’ll love NBI's True Crime CLE. This engaging and informative series combines riveting true crime stories with insightful legal analysis

settings.subtitle_1: Unlike most national CLE providers, we offer jurisdiction-specific content on topics where it matters most.
settings.subtitle_2: Hear litigation best practices directly from the judiciary. Get trial ready and brush up on courtroom do’s and don’ts.

settings.html:
Get Better Results For Your Clients.

Get More Referrals.

It all starts with better CLE.

GET STARTED

Our Mission:

NBI is dedicated to providing continuing legal education focused on your needs. It is our mission to empower lawyers and support staff with the practical legal knowledge and skills they need to succeed.

Our #1 Goal:

Simply put, we insist on providing the very best CLE and making it as accessible as possible. No matter what format you prefer, we’ve got resources and skill-based courses fit for you.

Find your next CLE course below:

settings.title: Why Thousands of Subscribers Choose NBI

settings.html:
Protect Your Time, Money, And Effort With NBI’s Worry-Free CLE Guarantee

(official looking accreditation logo here, idk, something that makes it clear NBI is endorsed by the FL state bar)

All CLE at NBI is pre-approved with the FL CLE board. Unlike many other CLE providers, we won’t force you to jump through hoops with a reciprocal credit request that could be denied after your CLE deadline.

After completing your CLE, simply take the approval number we give you and enter it on the bar’s website with ZERO risk of it being denied. With other CLE providers, there’s no guarantee the CLE you spent time and money to complete will even count.
